projects.title:
LynkTown App and
website

summary.heading: Lynk Town is a comprehensive digital platform that connects fashion designers and customers.
points: First connections are made via social media, and customers can place orders using the designer's link. Where customers receive personalised products delivered to their door.

Lynk Town app was created for people who can't keep up with technological changes and are concerned about customer dissatisfaction from online stores, and there was no platform for them to Start and expand their business online safely because vendors could not trust clients and vice versa.

problem.heading: Why to design this website?
points: Poor communication b/w vendor & customer
Hard to manage order payments, shipping, returns, alterations, and more
No personalized approach for customers
Hard to get customised products and orders
Customers worry on receiving wrong products, payment to sellers
Trouble for new vendors to scale brand  globally.

points.heading: Create a Responsive Fashion Segmenet App & Website
points.description: We aimed to create a well-thought-out responsive app & webdesign to deliver fast-loading experience on all devices.

points.heading: Impress with Efficient UX/UI Design
points.description: We strived to provide stunning UX/UI solutions within simple yet effective fashion segment app & website design.

points.heading: Establish communication b/w vendor & customer
points.description: Goal was to reach the right customers by providing quality products of readymade and customised products  by providing option for customers to add measurents manually and establishing faster communication to provide testing and gain the attention and trust of potential customers.

points.heading: Build a Functional Vendor App
points.description: Our goal was to create a functional and user-friendly Vendor application to allow managing orders manually (using single link).

solutions.heading: Vendor has Full control over all features and functions of his order. User can recieve customised order.

solutionPoints.title: Vendor Panel
points: Connection established between vendor and customer through social media.
Available online as well as offline
Administration community of industry experts to learn new ways to evolve your brand on social platforms.
Manage order payments, shipping, returns, alterations, and more on LynkTown.
Recieveing measurement for customised products

solutionPoints.title: Customer Panel
points: Order incudes Customized or ready-made products
Adding measurement manually for customsed orders
Product alteration can be made in a simple way

projects.review: They've analyzed what we need and had provided us with a design of an innovative, functional & user-friendly website

projects.title: LYNKE Mobile App

summary.heading: LYNKE is a mobile application that allows you to create a customisable, interactive business card
points: LYNKE is a mobile application that allows you to create a customisable, interactive business card
This app creates interactive two-sided business cards. It is an effective networking tool as well as a powerful branding asset.
